data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Wenshan Zhuang and Miao who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Wenshan Zhuang and Miao, Yunnan, China
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Wenshan Zhuang and Miao, Yunnan, China.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 610,700 souls in Wenshan Zhuang and Miao and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 46,328 believers find a person of peace today among the 564,372 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Qabiao, Pubiao people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Qabiao, Pubiao people know you.
Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Wenshan Zhuang and Miao, Yunnan, China that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the county of Wenshan Zhuang and Miao who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.focus_label: Wenshan Zhuang and Miao, Yunnan, China
data.section_summary:
the county of Wenshan Zhuang and Miao, Yunnan, China has a population of 610,700.

We estimate Wenshan Zhuang and Miao has 46,328 people who might know Jesus, 9,866 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 554,506 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Wenshan Zhuang and Miao to agree with you and with one another.
